main event: On 20 August 1949, a civilian reported seeing an unusual aircraft estimated to be 85 feet across, shaped like a flying wing, at an altitude of 40,000 feet while traveling west at high speed.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 20 seconds,It was flying at an estimated speed of 17,000 mph,The object's shape was described as similar to a B-26,No unusual maneuvers were reported, and there were no radar observations during the time of the sighting.
witness description: The witness was a former Armament Officer familiar with conventional aircraft.
